title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 285: Featuring Trevor Gillies
description:
On Thursday’s episode of Spittin’ Chiclets, the guys are joined by Trevor Gillies. Trevor joined (52:35) to talk about his career, his mustache, fighting Biz and more. The guys also break down the official first round of the NHL playoffs, with a few of the games happening earlier this week. The boys wrap up with some talk about writing novels and how RA once locked himself in a cabin and tried to write one.


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/schiclets
dc:creator: Barstool Sports
